meanings.definition: An exclamation of surprise or excitement.
meanings.sent1: Ayaya! I can't believe I won the game!
meanings.sent2: When she saw the fireworks, she shouted, 'Ayaya!'
meanings.sent3: Ayaya! I almost dropped my ice cream cone!
meanings.sent4: The sudden thunder made her scream, 'Ayaya!'
meanings.sent5: Ayaya! The magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat!

meanings.definition: A term used to express joy or happiness.
meanings.sent1: She always has an 'ayaya' on her face when she's with her friends.
meanings.sent2: The children's laughter filled the room with 'ayaya'.
meanings.sent3: The birthday cake was a tower of 'ayaya' for the kids.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a garden of 'ayaya' after receiving good news.
meanings.sent5: The puppy's tail wagged in pure 'ayaya' as it played with the ball.
